column2: "EWURADZE n'asɛm baa mo hɔ bio
column3: dɛ
column7: na kor bi mba wɔ hɔ:"

column2: "na wɔgogoor ndwamangor wɔ Egypt; wɔgogoor ndwamangor wɔ hɔn mbofrabermu: hɔ na womiamiaa hɔn enumfo
column3: na hɔ na wopirapiraa hɔn mbaabun mu mpokuwa."

column2: "Na hɔn edzin dze Ohola panyin no
column3: na n'akyerɛbaa Oholiba: na wɔbɛyɛɛ medze
column4: na wɔwoo mbabanyin na mbabaa. Na hɔn edzin no nye yi

column2: "Na Ohola kɔgoor ndwamangor ber a ɔyɛ medze; na n'enyi hyeew n'adɔfo ho
column3: n'amanyimfo Asiriafo no ho
column7: hɔn nyinara mberantsɛ a hɔn ho yɛ fɛw a

column2: "Na ɔdze no ndwamanyɛ kɔr hɔn do
column3: hɔn nyinara Asiriafo mu mbɛtseefo a: na hɔn mu biara a n'enyi hyeew no ho no
column4: ɔdze hɔn abosom nyina guu no ho fi."

column2: "Eso onngyaa no ndwamanyɛ no ofitsi Egypt nda no mu; na ne nkataasiaber mu na wɔnye no dae
column3: na wopiraa ne mbaabun mu mpokuwa: na wohuee hɔn ndwamanyɛ guu no do."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi miyii no hyɛɛ n'adɔfo nsa
column3: Asiriafo a n'enyi hyeew hɔn ho no nsa."

column2: "Woyinom na woyii n'adagyaw too gua: wɔfaa ne mbabanyin na ne mbabaa
column3: na ɔnoara wɔdze afona kum no: na ɔbɛyɛɛ fen wɔ mbaa mu; na wɔyɛɛ no n'atsɛmbudze."

column2: "Na n'akyerɛbaa Oholiba hun iyi
column3: naaso ɔprɔwee wɔ n'enyihyew mu kɛse seen ɔno
column4: na no ndwamanyɛ a ɔdɔɔ so seen n'akyerɛbaa no ndwamanyɛ no mu."

column2: "N'enyi hyeew Asiriafo ho
column3: ambradofo na mpanyin
column4: n'amanyimfo a woewuna ntar gɔsɔɔ
column6: hɔn nyinara mberantsɛ a hɔn ho yɛ fɛw a."

column2: "Na muhun dɛ no ho egu fi; hɔn beenu no faa kwan kor do."
"Na ɔmaa no ndwamanyɛ dɔɔ so; na ohun mbarimba a wɔasensan hɔn mfonyi wɔ fasu ho
column3: Kaldeafo ehonyi a wɔdze edur memen asensan
column6: akyekyertsir a wɔahyɛ no edur sensɛn hɔn etsir ho
column7: ehwɛ hɔn nyina a wɔyɛ dɛ ahenmba
column8: dɛ mbrɛ Babilɔnfo a wɔwɔ hɔn awobea Kaldea no wɔtse no."

column2: "Na n'enyi bɔɔ hɔn do ara pɛ na n'enyi hyeew hɔn ho
column3: na ɔsomaa abɔfo kɔr hɔn nkyɛn wɔ Kaldea."

column2: "Na Babilɔnfo no baa ne nkyɛn nye no bɛdaa dɔ mpa do
column3: na wɔdze hɔn ndwamanyɛ guu no ho fi
column4: na ɔnye hɔn guu noho fi
column5: na ne kra tseew noho fii hɔn nkyɛn."

column2: "Mbrɛ ɔdaa no ndwamanyɛ edzi
column3: na ɔmaa n'adagyaw daa edzi nye no: nna me kra tseew noho fii no ho
column4: dɛ mbrɛ me kra tseew noho fii n'akyerɛbaa ho no."

column2: "Naaso ɔmaa no ndwamangor dɔɔ so
column3: dze kaa ne mbofrabermu nda no a ɔgoor ndwamangor wɔ Egypt asaase do no."

column2: "Na n'enyi hyeew hɔn mponafo ho
column3: hɔn a hɔn honam tse dɛ nsoasopɔnkɔ honam
column4: na hɔn ahobaa tse dɛ mpɔnkɔ ahobaa."

column2: "Dɛm na edze kaa wo nkataasiaber mu ndwamanyɛ
column3: wɔ pira a Egyptfo piraa wo mpokuwa
column4: wɔ wo nkataasiaber mu enumfo no ntsi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: Oholiba
column4: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Hwɛ
column6: hɔn a wo kra atsew noho efi hɔn ho no
column7: na medze hɔn efi nkyɛnkyɛn nyinara aba wo do;"

column2: "Babilɔnfo na Kaldeafo nyinara
column3: Pekodfo
column4: Soafo na Koafo
column5: na Asiriafo a wɔka hɔn ho no nyinara: mberantsɛ a hɔn ho yɛ fɛw
column6: hɔn nyina ambradofo na mpanyin a
column7: ahenmba na atsenkafo a hɔn nyinara wɔtsetse mpɔnkɔ do."

column2: "Na wɔdze akondadze
column3: ntseaseanam na nhwiir
column4: na aman asafo; wɔdze nkataenyim na kyɛm na dadzekyɛw bɔbɔ wo do nsera ehyia: na medze atsɛmbu mebɛhyɛ hɔn nsa
column5: na woebu wo atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn atsɛmbudze tse."

column2: "Na medze me nyinkuntwe besi wo do
column3: na wɔnye wo edzi no ebufuhyew mu; wobotwitwa wo hwen na w'asowa; na wo nkaase bɔtotɔr afona ano: wɔbɛfa wo mbabanyin na wo mbabaa; na wo nkaase no gya bɛmen hɔn."

column2: "Wɔbɔworɔw wo ho ntar so
column3: na wɔafa wo ndwindze fɛɛfɛw no akɔ."

column2: "Dɛm na mebɛma w'atantandze no abɔ adze efi wo ho
column3: ɔnye wo ndwamangor a edze fi Egypt asaase do bae no: ma amma w'enyi do aannkyerɛ hɔn
column4: anaaso aannkaa Egypt bio."

column2: "Na mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Hwɛ
column3: medze wo bɛhyɛ hɔn a etan hɔn no nsa
column4: hɔn a wo kra atsew noho efi hɔn ho no nsa:"

column2: "na wɔnye wo bedzi no tan mu
column3: na woeyi w'afonadze nyina akɔ
column4: na woegyaa wo adagyaw kwatserkwa: na wo ndwamangor n'adagyaw bɛda edzi

column2: "Ndzɛmba yinom na wɔdze bɛyɛ wo
column3: wɔ dɛ akɔgor ndwamangor edzi amanaman ekyir dze hɔn abosom egu wo ho fi ntsi."

column2: "Anantsew w'akyerɛbaa no kwan do; dɛm ntsi medze no kɔɔpow bɛhyɛ wo nsa."
"Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Ebɔnom w'akyerɛbaa no kɔɔpow a ɔdɔ na ɔso no bi: wɔbɛyɛ wo ɔsesɛba na woedzi wo ho fɛw; dza ɔwɔ mu so."
"Asabow na awerɛhow bɛhyɛ wo ma
column3: ɔnye ahodwuruw na amamfoyɛ kɔɔpow
column4: ɔnye w'akyerɛbaa Samaria no kɔɔpow."

column2: "Ebɔnom na ehwiew mu mpo
column3: na awe ne fɛr
column4: na atsetsew w'enumfo mu: na emi na maka

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Osiandɛ wo werɛ efir me
column3: na atow me akyen w'ekyir ntsi
column4: dɛm ntsi soa w'atantandze na wo ndwamangor so."

column2: "EWURADZE see me bio so
column3: dɛ: Onyimpa ba
column4: aso ibobu Ohola na Oholiba atsɛn? Nna yi hɔn atantandze kyerɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na wɔatoto awar
column3: na bɔgya wɔ hɔn nsamu
column4: na wɔdze hɔn abosom atoto awar; na wɔama hɔn mba a wɔwoo hɔn maa me no so wɔahyew hɔn ogya mu abɔ afɔr ma wɔamemen hɔn."

column2: "Bio so iyi na wɔdze ayɛ me: woegu mo krɔnkrɔnbea ho fi da kor noara
column3: na woehura m'ahomgyenda no ho."

column2: "Na wonyae kunkum hɔn mba maa hɔn abosom no
column3: nna wɔbaa mo krɔnkrɔnbea da kor noara bohuraa ho; na
column4: hwɛ
column5: mbrɛ wɔayɛ wɔ me fi mu nye yi."

column2: "Na bio so hom asoma ekehyia mbarimba fir ekyirekyir: hɔn ho na wotuu abɔfo
column3: na
column4: hwɛ

column2: "na etsenaa mpikyi a ɔyɛ fɛw do
column3: ɔnye epon a wɔato si enyim a edze m'eduhuam na mo ngo sisii do."

column2: "Na nyimpadodow a hɔn ho adwe hɔn no hɔn dede ka no ho: na wɔdze asabokwafo kaa nyimpadodow no ho fi sar no do bae; na wɔdze nkaba hyehyɛɛ hɔn emu ebien nyina nsa
column3: na abɔtsir fɛɛfɛw bobɔɔ hɔn etsir."

column2: "Nna mekaa no wɔ nyia ɔayɛ aberwa wɔ awarto mu no ho dɛ
column3: Afei na wɔnye no bɔgor ndwamangor
column4: na ɔno so nye hɔn agor."

column2: "Na wɔkɔr no ho
column3: dɛ mbrɛ wɔkɔ edwaman ho: dɛm na wɔkɔr Ohola na Oholiba mbaa ndwaman no ho."

column2: "Na mbarimba atseneneefo
column3: wɔdze mbaa awartofo hɔn atsɛmbu
column4: na mbaa a wɔka bɔgya gu hɔn atsɛmbu bobu hɔn; osiandɛ wɔyɛ mbaa awartofo

column2: "Na mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Medze mboanofo bɛba hɔn do
column3: na medze hɔn ama ma wɔatow hɔn edzi akɔnaaba
column4: na wɔafa hɔn afo."

column2: "Na mboanofo no besiw hɔn abo
column3: ma wɔdze hɔn afona ekuku hɔn; wobokuku hɔn mbabanyin na hɔn mbabaa
column4: na wɔdze gya ahyew hɔn efi."

column2: "Dɛm na mebɛma atantandze abɔ adze wɔ asaase no do
column3: ma wɔaakyerɛkyerɛ mbaa nyina mma wɔaannyɛ hɔn atantandze no bi."

column2: "Na wɔbɛhyɛ hom atantandze no ananmu egu hom do
column3: na hom asoa hom abosom no hɔn bɔn no: na hom bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE Nyankopɔn."
